entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

entry.title: Home
entry.content:
Biography

Dr. Xiao Xiao received the B.S. and M.S. degrees from the Shandong University of Technology, Shandong, China, in 2010 and2012, respectively, and the Ph. D degree from University of Macau, Macau, China, in 2017, all in Electromechanical Engineering. He was a Research Fellow with the Department of Biomedical Engineering, National University of Singapore, Singapore. He is currently a Research Assistant Professor with the Department of Electrical and ElectronicEngineering, Southern University of Science and Technology, China.

In recent years, Dr. Xiao Xiao has participated in one Singapore Technology Acceleration Program, one National key R & D project, one NFSC project, and two Macao FDCT projects. He has published more than 30 international journal and conference papers and contributed 4 book chapters. He has applied 9 Chinese patents, 2 PCT patents, and 1 Singapore patent, among which 4 patents had been authorized.

Affiliations

Research Assistant Professor, Southern University of Science and Technology, Shenzhen, China.
Web: https://faculty.sustech.edu.cn/xiaox/en/

Research Interests

  1. Biomedical opto-mechatronics
  2. Minimally invasive surgery robot
  3. Micro/nano manipulation and positioning robot
  4. Miniature-sized robotic system design and control

Professional Activities

  1. Associate Editor, The 2021 IEEE International Conference on Advanced Robotics and Mechatronics (ICARM 2021)
  2. Session Chair, The 2021 International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA 2021)
  3. Junior Reviewer, IEEE/ASME Transactions on Mechatronics (TMECH Junior Reviewers Program 2020.07.01-2022.07.01)
  4. Senior Member, Chinese Mechanical Engineering Society
  5. Review Editor, Frontiers in Robotics and AI

Teaching

  1. FYP Mentor. Final Year Project-ME4101A, 2017/2018, “Image based guidance for snake robot in confined environments,” A01A0133919Y, Wu Yifan.
  2. FYP Mentor. Final Year Project-ME4101A, 2017/2018, “Control and end-effector force sensing of 4-DoFs concentric tube robot,” A0125665, Niam Jen Yang.
  3. Teaching Assistant. EIM 306, 2018/2019, “Designing a bending needle system for kidney biopsy,” A0161944B, Alicia Ng Mei Shen, A0157252H, Ashrina Majitha Binte Sultan A, and A0168383U, Frederick Ching.
  4. Teaching Assistant. The Biomedical Engineering Design Teams-BN3101, 2016/2017, “Design of a new kidney biopsy device with hemostatic function,” Won “The most innovative design award”, “The best presentation award”, and “The most elegant instrumentation award” among 12 BN3101 teams.
  5. Teaching Assistant. ELME-706 Mechatronics, 2015/2016, Dept. of Electromechanical Engineering, University of Macau, Macao.

Awards and Honors

  1. Xiao Xiao, Kirthika Senthil Kumar, Catherine Cai Jiayi, Liang Qiu, RoNi: Robotic Needle Intervention with Portable Positioning System. The Global Innovation Design Competition of Medical Robotics (MRC2019), Global, Best Structure, 12.09-12.11, 2019, Shanghai, China.
  2. Xiaoyi Gu, Changsheng Li, Xiao Xiao, Design of an Adaptive and Compliant Transoral Robotic Surgery (ACTOR) System. The Engineering Medical Innovation Global Competition (Emedic Global 2017), Global, Gold Award (1/17), 09.29-09.30, 2017, Taipei, Taiwan.

Reviewership for Journals and Conferences

  1. IEEE/ASME Transactions on Mechatronics (TMECH)
  2. IEEE Transactions on Industrial Informatics (TII)
  3. International Journal of Control, Automation and Systems (IJCAS)
  4. Review of Scientific Instruments (RSI)
  5. The International Journal of Advanced Manufacturing Technology (JAMT)
  6. IEEE Access
  7. IEEE Robotics and Automation Letters (RAL)
  8. Frontiers in Robotics and AI
  9. 2019 IEEE/RSJ International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems (IROS 2019), November 3- 8, 2019, Macau, China.
  10. 2019 IEEE International Conference on Automation Science and Engineering (CASE 2019), August 22-26, 2019, Vancouver, Canada.
  11. 2018 IEEE/RSJ International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems (IROS 2018), October 1-5, 2018, Madrid, Spain.
  12. 2016 IEEE/RSJ International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems (IROS 2017), September 24-28, 2017, Vancouver, Canada.
  13. 2016 IEEE/RSJ International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems (IROS 2016), October 9-14, 2016, Daejeon, Korea.
  14. IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA 2016), May 16-21, 2016, Stockholm, Sweden.
  15. IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA 2015), May 26-30, 2015, Seattle, Washington.
  16. 2016 IEEE International Conference on Advanced Intelligent Mechatronics (AIM 2016), July 12–15, 2016, Banff, Alberta, Canada.
  17. 2014 IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA 2014), May 31 - June 7, 2014, Hong Kong, China.
  18. 2014 IEEE International Conference on Automation Science and Engineering (CASE 2014), August 18-22, 2014, Taipei, Taiwan.
  19. 2014 IEEE/RSJ International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems (IROS 2014), September 14–18, 2014, Chicago, Illinois, USA.
entry.summary:
Biography

Dr. Xiao Xia
